t:
We've been digging at this graveyard for the body for about an hour, but there's still no sign of it.

Finally, I asked my friend,
                            “Where's the body?”



“Here it is,” he said, and the last thing I saw was him swinging the shovel.
c:
I lay there buried,
Gasping for one last breath.
I'll never know what I did wrong,
As I waited for death.



Collab and share the story of a #coldwindy night. #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba





#fakefriends #revenge #death #burried #digginggraves #murder
